listing.name: Calendar Power-Up
listing.description:
Bring perspective to due dates with the Calendar Power-Up for Trello. Whether you are planning a conference, managing an editorial calendar, or organizing a family vacation, the Calendar Power-Up let’s you display cards with due dates in a weekly or monthly calendar view. Easily prioritize cards by dragging and dropping them on the calendar to automatically update their due dates, and export your Trello calendar to third party apps with an iCalendar link.

- Display and filter cards with due dates in a weekly or monthly calendar view.

- Manage due dates by dragging and dropping cards on the calendar.

- Easily see completed tasks by marking due dates complete.

- Export a board’s calendar to third party calendars with each board’s unique iCalendar link.

- The Calendar Power-Up is supported on the web and iOS and Android mobile devices.

![screenshot](https://calendar.trello.services/images/Calendar_1.jpg)
![screenshot](https://calendar.trello.services/images/Calendar_2.jpg)
![screenshot](https://calendar.trello.services/images/Calendar_3.jpg)
![screenshot](https://calendar.trello.services/images/Calendar_4.jpg)
listing.overview: Visualize Trello cards in a calendar view.

card.desc:
## Where the changes take place

**Public Web > Proposal Application > Optional Extensions > Production Animal Technician/s** (see BELOW)

## Proposal types impacted: all

‌

![Snag\_2692e294.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64cc3cd1c76e68790e1571f6/download/Snag_2692e294.png)

- New Applicants
- Renewing Members
- MTA
- Run-off

## Changes

### 5.3.1

For RENEWAL proposal only, edit the bullet point “Please review and update the information provided and confirm the staff for this cover” to read: _Please review and update the information provided._

![Snag\_222898e1.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dd972ca11736c5974e75a3/download/Snag_222898e1.png)

### 5.3.1.b

For ALL proposal types include new bullet question: _The standard cover for this extension is $50,000, any one claim. You can request a higher limit if required._

![Snag\_2236ca2e.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dd9acef01fce65ba61c669/download/Snag_2236ca2e.png)

‌

### 5.3.1.c

Edit bullet to read: “Please ensure the Practice and Practice **Production Animal Technician/s** are …. “

‌

![Snag\_2239f130.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dd9b9cd9eae9aa1ceae8d1/download/Snag_2239f130.png)

‌

‌

### 5.3.1.d

Delete sentence: ~~The standard current cover for Technician…~~

![Snag\_223e9f30.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dd9cd0198a8f0eea5b5001/download/Snag_223e9f30.png)

‌

### 5.3.2

For ALL proposal types include new required [Yes/NO] question: _Do you/the Practice want cover for Production Animal Technician/s?_

‌

![Snag\_224ce3a7.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dda076b104cbbebf1859f7/download/Snag_224ce3a7.png)

### 5.3.2.a

Add help tip to question. Text to read: _Refer to Policy Information above for more information about this cover._

![Snag\_226c4047.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dda87e0b0888f40ef5ab7f/download/Snag_226c4047.png)

#### Behaviour

If [YES], render the follow-on question to read: _If you require a higher limit than $50,000, any one claim, please specify what limit you require._

![Snag\_22559fad.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dda2b5602cabb55a9a949f/download/Snag_22559fad.png)

### 5.3.2.b

- Delete question: _Please specify what higher level of …_
- Delete help tip

‌

![Snag\_225a1140.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dda3d674161fafa291dc6f/download/Snag_225a1140.png)

‌

### 5.3.2.c

NOTE: This addition will enable

Add a multi-select checkbox list with options:

- $100,000
- $200,000
- Other

‌

If “Other” is selected, render the write-in text box with “Enter other amount” as default text below the checklist as in example:

![Snag\_22643f35.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64dda6737065047a57398601/download/Snag_22643f35.png)

The inputed “Other” amount needs to be reflected in the **Proposal Form PDF>Optional Extensions>Production Animal Technician/s.**

NOTE:

Currently there is a question “Please specify what higher level of cover is required” with a write-in text box with default text “e.g. $100,000”).

In this change the question is removed, and the box only appears if “Other” is selected.

If the selection of $100,000 or $200,000 or input of the 'Other' field, [YES] will populate the question       should be added to the same place in the Proposal PDF as it currently does - see below.

‌

###

### 5.3.3

BELOW: summary of the changes.

‌

![FireShot\_Capture\_016\_-\_Technician\_Coverage\_-\_VPIS\_-\_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64bdfcb7345495c89db0ecb1/download/FireShot_Capture_016_-_Technician_Coverage_-_VPIS_-_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png)

‌

### **6. Changes for following templates only:**

- Renew
- MTA

Move _Your Current cover is: $xxxxx_

**From here:**

‌

![Snag\_2274cd5d.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64ddaaae36705793a2e72531/download/Snag_2274cd5d.png)

**To here:**

![Snag\_2275f6e9.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb6ec90c7159e2cbb9a7c2/attachments/64ddaafab33ca3777c3b2f3b/download/Snag_2275f6e9.png)

card.desc:
**Advised that this a fairly complicated explanation that might be better to have a quick run through with Amelia or Meghan.**

_These changes are relatively simple but they do trigger dynamically rendered questions in another area of the form if certain conditions are met._

_They also connect with content in the relative generated pdfs that needs to be updated._

**This ticket also relates to 5.2.2**

## Who does it impact: All proposals

- New Applicants
- Renewing Members
- MTA & Run-Off

## Core change requirement

- Delete questions from the Proposal Form
- Update the relevant PDFs

## Where the changes are to be made

Questions will be deleted from the section: [**Public Portal**](https://public.uat.ezidocs.nz "‌") **\> Proposal Application > Main Practices & Branches > Add Main Practice** _also_ **Edit Main Practice > Your Business Details**

Sign in details are [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J0GwOZUA2HdhtRXmBuD7iCchCZnvIFWOaZgWaIwZxDE/edit#heading=h.4tc1i3ueyd7v "‌").

‌

BELOW: Questions are triggered from this button when the form is being filled in for the first time:

![Snag\_a9483d2.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9f047e176251c49da8fd1/download/Snag_a9483d2.png)

BELOW:

Questions are triggered from either of these buttons when the Main Practice has already been added.

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-21\_at\_2.44.07\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9f13af6405492b46393a5/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-21_at_2.44.07_PM.png)

## Changes

NOTE: while these following questions are to be deleted from this section in the **Proposal Form UI**, they are going to be moved into other sections. The inputted answers to these questions currently render in the Proposal PDF should remain the same after the changes to the order in the UI.

Delete three questions from **Your Business Details UI**:

1. Are you going to apply for Non-Veterinary Activity Consultancy extension cover?
2. Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?
3. Are you going to apply for Conveyor Activities extension cover for individual Technicians?
   ‌

![FireShot\_Capture\_007\_-\_Main\_Business\_Details\_-\_VPIS\_-\_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9f9d3f6bf1d76f6a85e9c/download/FireShot_Capture_007_-_Main_Business_Details_-_VPIS_-_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png)

NOTE: “Are you going to apply for Conveyor Activities extension cover for individual Technicians?” only renders in the UI when “Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?” is selected.

## Checking the follow-on affects

### Professional Staff>Add Staff>Technicians

Currently if “Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?” is selected the question: “Does the Practice require Technician Extension cover for claims arising from work undertaken by this Technician?” is added to [**Professional Staff> Add Professional Staff > Technician**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mrlm71Fqqs0dHdkRDYTPEuIcESwkQjMM/view?usp=drive_link "‌"). (SEE image below)

‌

![FireShot\_Capture\_008\_-\_Professional\_Staff\_Applicant\_Details\_-\_VPIS\_-\_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9fe657b98244884318b0d/download/FireShot_Capture_008_-_Professional_Staff_Applicant_Details_-_VPIS_-_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png)

Previously, when “Yes” was selected for this question, a follow on question would appear in the UI: “Does the Practice require cover for conveyor activities for work undertaken by this Technician?”.

After the origin question is removed, this follow on question should also be deleted.

‌

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-22\_at\_3.25.40\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64bb4f866bebe2b5ad82ae72/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-22_at_3.25.40_PM.png)

### Proposal PDF

ASSIST: for docs on how to test PDFs see [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J0GwOZUA2HdhtRXmBuD7iCchCZnvIFWOaZgWaIwZxDE/edit#heading=h.bj5mgryz5f5a "‌"). For this ticket a good example to use would be **Clutha Veterinary Association Incorporated**.

Currently if “Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?” is selected, the following question is added to the **Proposal PDF>Appendix: People to be insured:**

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-21\_at\_3.52.40\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64ba014492c449ac19b46367/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-21_at_3.52.40_PM.png)

CHECK: once the origin question is deleted, this sentence should show BUT ….should also be deleted from the PDF.

Currently, if “Are you going to apply for Conveyor Activities extension cover for individual Technicians?” is selected, the following question is added to the **Proposal PDF>Optional Extensions > Technician Coverage section:**

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-22\_at\_1.21.49\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64bb2f72e32cfb23d1438c98/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-22_at_1.21.49_PM.png)

CHECK: after the origin questions are deleted, these two questions should be deleted from the PDF also.

card.desc:
THIS TICKET IS DEPENDENT ON 5.3 TO SHIP FIRST HOWEVER CARRY ON WITH INVESTIGATION.

**PROBLEM:** Broker Admin forgetting to include a premium when Quoting

## CHANGES

To affect:

- **Public Web Portal>Proposal Form>Optional Extensions>Technician Coverage**
- **Admin Portal>Proposals>{submitted member proposal}>Premiums table**

### 6.1

**Dependent on Ticket 5.3:** If Yes is selected for question “If you require a higher limit ….” three checkboxes with multiple select options show

- $100,000
- $200,000
- Other

NOTE: If “Other” is selected, an existing write-in field appears below checkboxes.

### 6.2

When the applicant selects $100k and/or $200k the **BH Additional Technician Premium ($50k+)** field in **Admin Portal>>>Premiums** table is populated with the calculated amount.

![image.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3c9650d03e8a0be90d32/attachments/64b71603921e168f9ef238a5/download/image.png)

card.desc:
# NOTE: STILL WAITING FOR PDF TO ALLOW EXCHANGE OF LINK IN 4.2.1

## Background

**Optional Extensions>Embryo or Semen Storage and Embryo or Semen Transfer**:

- The name of this extension is changing and edits are required to the UI and PDFs.
- The **Declaration** section of the UI & PDF is being renamed and no longer requires YES/NO reporting.

## Changes  impact:

- New Applicant
- Renewal
- MTA

## Changes to: Optional Extensions UI

‌

## 1. NAME CHANGE:

1\.1 Edit the name in the **lefthand navigation:** [NOTE: Given this name is too long to fit please show what is possible to read] e.g : _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen…_

1\.2 Edit the name of the **Optional Extensions** homepage UI to read: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

![Snag\_12b3c9c4.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64d9a2392bc372109bc38c36/download/Snag_12b3c9c4.png)

##

1\.3 **In UI**, when **Optional Extension>Frozen Embryo**… is selected from lefthand navigation edit UI heading to read: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

**From this:**

![Snag\_12d4b8db.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64d9aaa797d9f2cc0f8242ed/download/Snag_12d4b8db.png)

‌

**To this:**

![image.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64d9ab015378ab68c6680293/download/image.png)

‌

‌

‌

- _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen_
- _Additional Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen ($50k+)_

card.desc:
## Background

**Optional Extensions>Embryo or Semen Storage and Embryo or Semen Transfer**:

- The name of this extension is changing and edits are required to the UI and PDFs.
- The **Declaration** section of the UI & PDF is being renamed and no longer requires YES/NO reporting.

## Changes  impact:

- New Applicant
- Renewal
- MTA

## Changes to: Optional Extensions UI

‌

1. Edit the name in the **lefthand navigation:** [NOTE: Given this name is too long to fit please show what is possible to read] e.g : _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen…_
2. Edit the name of the **Optional Extensions** homepage UI to read: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

![Snag\_12b3c9c4.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64d9a2392bc372109bc38c36/download/Snag_12b3c9c4.png)

##

3\. **In UI**, when **Optional Extension>Frozen Embryo**… is selected from lefthand navigation edit UI heading to read: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

**From this:**

![Snag\_12d4b8db.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64d9aaa797d9f2cc0f8242ed/download/Snag_12d4b8db.png)

‌

**To this:**

![image.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64d9ab015378ab68c6680293/download/image.png)

‌

**4.** In **UI>Optional Extensions>Embryo or Semen Storage and Embryo or Semen Transfer**, when **YES** is selected to include cover:

‌

![Snag\_1cd5f34c.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc3a547bc35f7d3e16f967/download/Snag_1cd5f34c.png)

4\.1 In **Proposal PDF**, edit bullet under **Requested Optional Extensions to read**: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

‌

![Snag\_1cd76838.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc3ab5bcf6a5e78bd636d3/download/Snag_1cd76838.png)

‌

‌

‌

**4.2** Edit heading in **Proposal** **PDF>Optional Extensions to read:** _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

‌

![Snag\_1c6b138e.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc1ef87688f8e286c611a2/download/Snag_1c6b138e.png)

4\.3 In **Trigger PDF**, edit to read: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

![Snag\_1ceb8593.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc3fdbc0e0f196cd9a1fac/download/Snag_1ceb8593.png)

4\.3.1 In **Trigger PDF**, if cover is included edit to read: _Require higher level of cover:_

![Snag\_1cedec32.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc40788f7deb7a2c173416/download/Snag_1cedec32.png)

‌

4\.4 Edit name in following PDFs when cover is included to read: Section 2.4 _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

- Insurance Quote
- Insurance Schedule
- Certificate of Insurance

![Snag\_1cf1e29a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc417c7d9fff907ef4a9bc/download/Snag_1cf1e29a.png)

‌

4\.5 In **UI**, if **NO** is selected [do NOT include cover] edit **Proposal PDF>Optional Extensions - not required** to read: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

‌

![Snag\_1ce96591.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc3f4f8ee174ed60eac97e/download/Snag_1ce96591.png)

4\.5.1 In the following **PDFs** when **NO** is selected [do NOT include cover] edit **Optional Extensions - Not Included** to read: _Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

- Insurance Quote
- Insurance Schedule
- Certificate of Insurance

‌

‌

![Snag\_1cff6c6c.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc44f3adc2bb04683077ed/download/Snag_1cff6c6c.png)

‌

**5. In UI,** include new bullet to read:

- _Please note: This extension is only for Practices using frozen embryos and/or frozen semen, otherwise this cover is not required._

![Snag\_12e523ad.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64d9aedbc0879d229a86fffe/download/Snag_12e523ad.png)

‌

‌

5\.1 **In UI**, edit name of link to read: _VPIS Standard Operating Procedure Stock Register and Maintenance Log for Frozen Embryo and Frozen Semen Storage, Processing & Transfer_

5\.1.1 Change out PDF this name links to _**[PDF to come]**_

![Snag\_175a630a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dad305f6ed571e001c6ddc/download/Snag_175a630a.png)

‌

5\.2 **In UI**, edit bullet to read: …._, or provide evidence of your alternative procedure._

‌

![Snag\_175d0d5a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dad3b35f05b4b6573523ff/download/Snag_175d0d5a.png)

5\.3 **In UI**, include new bullet to read: _The standard cover for this extension is $50,000, any one claim. You can choose a higher limit if required._

‌

![Snag\_1789a4e1.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dadf1d393812be7791132c/download/Snag_1789a4e1.png)

‌

‌

6\. **In UI,** edit question to read: _Do you/the Practice want to be insured for Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer?_

‌

![Snag\_1780e6e7.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dadce03e9d6c21c274c431/download/Snag_1780e6e7.png)

‌

‌

6\.1. **In UI**, when **YES** is selected from the question asked in 5 above, delete the sentence: _~~The standard current cover for Embryo or Semen Storage..….~~_

![Snag\_1790ab96.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dae0eac154a30c8b744113/download/Snag_1790ab96.png)

6\.2 **In UI**, edit sentence _‘Do you/the Practice require a higher level of cover…’_ to read:

_If you require a higher limit than $50,000, any one claim, please specify what limit you require._

‌

![Snag\_17aac876.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dae79a96502b0275c2ce66/download/Snag_17aac876.png)

‌

6\.2.1 If **YES** is selected delete the sentence that appears: _~~Please specify what higher level of ….~~_

The  editable field and help tip remain.

![Snag\_17b13684.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dae93ed82a3d39af5e7f12/download/Snag_17b13684.png)

‌

6\.2.2 **In PDF**, edit question to read: _Do you/the Practice require a higher level of cover?_

‌

![Snag\_1c7d7473.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc23ad55cb34898a294b11/download/Snag_1c7d7473.png)

## **7. Changes to Declaration UI & PDF**

7\.1 **In UI**, update ‘Declaration’ heading to read: _Conditions_

![Snag\_1c490a3c.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc164297b962274b5d5dee/download/Snag_1c490a3c.png)

‌

7\.2 Delete **YES/NO** selections and clauses from UI

‌

![Snag\_1c5fa70e.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc1c0c0af22abb169349d5/download/Snag_1c5fa70e.png)

7\.2.1 Delete **YES/NO** responses and clauses from PDF:

![Snag\_1c64110f.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc1d2db5341894bd5dc8d9/download/Snag_1c64110f.png)

‌

7\.3 **In UI**, replace deleted **Yes/No** clauses with the following:

_The terms of your policy requires you to use a reasonable effort to comply with the VPIS Standard Operating Procedure Stock Register and Maintenance Log for Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing & Transfer (VPIS SOP)._

_If you do not intend complying with the VPIS SOP you must provide evidence of your alternative procedure by uploading here to be considered for cover._

_Alternatively you can email to us by following the instructions below._

‌

7\.3.1 Create a link to PDF from the name: _The VPIS Standard Operating Procedure Stock Register and Maintenance Log for Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing & Transfer._

![Snag\_1c8a8731.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc2706ff6bf6921ed93049/download/Snag_1c8a8731.png)

7\.4 Include an **Upload** documents function as used in the **Claims and Additional Information** UI.

‌

![Snag\_1c8d6533.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc27c2351e4a8489eba5b4/download/Snag_1c8d6533.png)

‌

7\.4.1 Uploaded documents will save to: **General UI>Files**

‌

![Snag\_1c99c857.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc2aee4d467589a8a8eb59/download/Snag_1c99c857.png)

7\.4.2 The **email link** will operate to send email:

![Snag\_1c9c718e.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3cd614fc5cbe26753f46/attachments/64dc2b9cedda8367ba3fafb7/download/Snag_1c9c718e.png)

card.desc:
## Background [need to complete which documents and where it populates - see 4 below

**Optional Extension>Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer: BA Controls**

Investigation to provide VPIS an estimate to allow BA to include an editable Endorsement from **Additional Information>Endorsements** _[per existing Locum Cover Policy endorsement]_ if a Member decides they will not follow the VPIS SOP and uploads an Alternative Procedure.

##

![Snag\_1cadf487.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64dc2c12de86a0837ec09d9b/attachments/64dc3017a9fd81474ab24f7a/download/Snag_1cadf487.png)

‌

## Change

In **Additional Information>Endorsements:**

1. Create a ‘Choose to Include’ Endorsement selection named: _Include Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Policy_

‌

![Snag\_1cb12eb3.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64dc2c12de86a0837ec09d9b/attachments/64dc30eb4f9392f47cfd6c5e/download/Snag_1cb12eb3.png)

2\. Include non-editable heading to read: _Section 2.4 Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_

![Snag\_1cb4574b.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64dc2c12de86a0837ec09d9b/attachments/64dc31ba8854cc278b8ab47c/download/Snag_1cb4574b.png)

**3. Include editable text box to read:** For the purpose of cover under this Section, all references in the **Policy** to the **VPIS** _Standard Operating Procedure Stock Register and Maintenance Log for Frozen Embryo & Frozen Semen Storage, Processing and Transfer_ shall be taken to be a reference to the **Insured’s** Alternative Procedure which has been provided by the **Insured** to **VPIS**.

![Snag\_1cb7c44e.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64dc2c12de86a0837ec09d9b/attachments/64dc329af49f5c99921eef85/download/Snag_1cb7c44e.png)

4\. CHECK WHERE IT POPULATES IN QUOTE & INSURANCE SCHEDULE & COI IF APPLICABLE

## Where these changes take place

**Public Web>Proposal Application>Main Practices & Branches> Add/Edit/Review Main Practice Branch Form**

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-04\_at\_10.17.50\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d0192f136093022f30e328/attachments/64d0196517c261da8fd6a81b/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-04_at_10.17.50_AM.png)

## Changes

### 26.1

When YES is selected at question **Do you have contracts with any of the following or other organisations: MPI, AsureQuality, local Zoos?** && the when YES is selected for the following question (which appears after the first is selected) **Are you required to hold Professional Liability Insurance under these contracts?**

- Edit the current wording
  “Please provide a copy of the relevant section”
  to be:
  “Please submit a copy of your contract, or the section outlining your insurance requirements.”

See BELOW

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_10.14.23\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d0192f136093022f30e328/attachments/64d01b42b4c1b616ab15818e/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_10.14.23_AM.png)

‌

# 26.1 PASS

- New
- Renew
- MTA
- Run-off

![Snag\_1ba824a9.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d0192f136093022f30e328/attachments/64dbed11a0fd04fd046fb93e/download/Snag_1ba824a9.png)

### 26.2

When YES is selected for the question **“Does the Practice operate out of a commercial premise?”** and the Commercial Premise fields appear, edit the content:

“Is the postal address different from the physical address? We do require an address to deliver mail to, so select Yes if you haven't included a physical address for your business.”

to be:

“Is the postal address different from the physical address?”

[DELETE~~We do require an address to deliver mail to, so select Yes if you haven't included a physical address for your business.~~]

‌

# 26.2 PASS

- New
- Renew

**Optional Extensions>Embryo or Semen Storage and Embryo or Semen Transfer**:

- The name of this extension is changing and edits are required to the UI and PDFs.
- The **Declaration** section of the UI & PDF is being renamed and no longer requires YES/NO reporting.

## Changes  impact:

- New Applicant
- Renewal
- MTA

data.text:
@jessicaajami1 @meghanhughes20 Jessica, your query about Excess was a serendipitous one.  I’ve confirmed with the client that Excess should act as for the rules you are creating for LOI. e.g.

- If BA makes a change to Member selections under Excess Options and pushes the submitted proposal back to In-Progress, the BA made changes should delete and return to Member selections.
- When the Member opens the In-Progress proposal their original selections will be included for update.
- When the Member resubmits the proposal, the Broker UI, Proposal PDF will update with the new submission selections.

**Current issue with BA selected Excess rules:**

In my testing of BA changes to Excess Options:

- the BA changes are not returning to Member selections when pushed back to In-Progress. This is incorrect.
- When the member resubmits their proposal, the BA Excess selections are not being overwritten in the PDF.

Should I write a new ticket for this @meghanhughes20 @jessicaajami1 ?

@jessicaajami1 HI Jessica, I’ve updated the **Description of Changes** above with the confirmed rules I conveyed below regarding what happens when BA pushes submitted proposal back after making changes to the LOI Options.

card.desc:
NEW: functionality to allow BA to manually change LOI in a submitted proposal.

NOTE: This new function will act in the same way as adding/deleting Optional Extensions. What the Practice has selected locks into the PDF Proposal. **Any changes by BA do not update the Proposal but does populate Quote, Insurance Schedule and Invoice.**

## Background:

When Member submits a proposal VPIS may decide not to cover them for the LOI (Limits of Insurance) they've selected, and/or include a different one.

**This new function will allow the Admin to manage the LOI and make the change, without needing to push the Proposal back to In-Progress for the Practice to re-submit.**

The Member selects the Limit of Indemnity from the **Proposal Form UI>Limits of Insurance Cover:**

![Snag\_2e2b272.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d595a635a4ca69f7f4179c/download/Snag_2e2b272.png)

Their selections they’ve made show in **General UI>Premiums**. In this example the Member has requested quotes for 2 LOI’s [$1m & $2m] AND 2 Excess’s [$2k & $5k].

![Snag\_2e8c57f.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d59733533a06ed173ac7f3/download/Snag_2e8c57f.png)

The premium calculation sheet [highlighted in yellow] is displaying the values for the $2m LOI and $5k Excess.

![Snag\_2f13ac8.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d5995e439bef01f64c2f98/download/Snag_2f13ac8.png)

If the BA wanted to view the calculation for the $2m LOI and $2k Excess, they’d select the $2k excess and the values sheet would show the calculations for that selection

![Snag\_2f77497.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d59af988ccbcc39c7bf5d1/download/Snag_2f77497.png)

## Where the change will take place

**Admin Portal>[select submitted proposal]>Premiums tab.**

See:

[https://www.loom.com/share/aa85477640fb4d65a0df079085cdb9dc](https://www.loom.com/share/aa85477640fb4d65a0df079085cdb9dc "smartCard-embed")

## Changes

See summary below:

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-31\_at\_11.09.20\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64c6eda5a1f908467d709459/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-31_at_11.09.20_AM.png)

### 1. **Allow BA to add LOI options which will generate additional Quote.**

In the same style as the two other option boxes, add a new option box below with the heading: “LOI Options, any one claim”.

Multiple select checkbox options:

- $500,000
- $750,000
- $1,000,000
- $2,000,000
- $3,000,000
- $4,000,000
- $5,000,000

Add a write in box for a custom amount “Other LOI”

NOTE: BA can apply LOI options to any of the Indemnity amounts - see below.

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-31\_at\_11.16.35\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64c6ef59a4a593383fbcef57/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-31_at_11.16.35_AM.png)

#### Behaviour

- If BA **deselects** options, new Quotes will not generate
  If BA **selects** new options new Quotes - one for each LOI option selected - will generate.

### 2. Add help tips

Beside the existing Excess Options and new LOI Options boxes, add help tips that read: “Manage which Options are quoted here.”

### 3. Where/when does it show

When BA sends Quote to Member the LOI Option displays in each of these pages depending on which option the BA wishes to view.

![Snag\_2c391e9a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdaf0e046829662ac0cebe/download/Snag_2c391e9a.png)

IF BA chooses to view the $500,000 option, the General UI will update:

![Snag\_2c3b8394.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdafab590c0b3e12c9dfba/download/Snag_2c3b8394.png)

Each option creates a version of the Insurance Quote which is sent to Member. If only one LOI option selected, only one Quote will generate, if three LOI options are selected, there Schedules will generate.

![Snag\_2c3c9a25.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdaff2c20d6317b839f1a3/download/Snag_2c3c9a25.png)

**Quote Schedule & Insurance Schedule**

Populates same place in each Schedule:

![Snag\_2c4565bb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdb233aa03e6fd295bb6ff/download/Snag_2c4565bb.png)

‌

![Snag\_2c4565bb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdb233aa03e6fd295bb6ff/download/Snag_2c4565bb.png)

‌

‌

**15 August: IF BA PUSHES SUBMITTED PROPOSAL BACK TO IN-PROGRESS**

‌

- If the BA makes a change to the LOI options, and then pushes the Proposal back to the Member (**from Submitted to In-Progress**), the Proposal returns to the _Member selected state_ [e.g any change made to the LOI by the BA IS not saved].
- The Member receives the proposal back with the selections they [the Member made] before submitting.
- When the Member resubmits the proposal, the BA controls and reporting etc will update as if it’s a new Submission with all selections the Member has made from In-Progress.

![Snag\_2f13ac8.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d5995e439bef01f64c2f98/download/Snag_2f13ac8.png)

If the BA wanted to view the calculation for the $2m LOI and $2k Excess, they’d select the $2k excess and the values sheet would show the calculations for that selection

![Snag\_2f77497.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d59af988ccbcc39c7bf5d1/download/Snag_2f77497.png)

## Where the change will take place

**Admin Portal>[select submitted proposal]>Premiums tab.**

See:

[https://www.loom.com/share/aa85477640fb4d65a0df079085cdb9dc](https://www.loom.com/share/aa85477640fb4d65a0df079085cdb9dc "smartCard-embed")

## Changes

See summary below:

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-31\_at\_11.09.20\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64c6eda5a1f908467d709459/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-31_at_11.09.20_AM.png)

### 1. **Allow BA to add LOI options which will generate additional Quote.**

In the same style as the two other option boxes, add a new option box below with the heading: “LOI Options, any one claim”.

Multiple select checkbox options:

- $500,000
- $750,000
- $1,000,000
- $2,000,000
- $3,000,000
- $4,000,000
- $5,000,000

Add a write in box for a custom amount “Other LOI”

NOTE: BA can apply LOI options to any of the Indemnity amounts - see below.

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-31\_at\_11.16.35\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64c6ef59a4a593383fbcef57/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-31_at_11.16.35_AM.png)

#### Behaviour

- If BA **deselects** options, new Quotes will not generate
  If BA **selects** new options new Quotes - one for each LOI option selected - will generate.

### 2. Add help tips

Beside the existing Excess Options and new LOI Options boxes, add help tips that read: “Manage which Options are quoted here.”

### 3. Where/when does it show

When BA sends Quote to Member the LOI Option displays in each of these pages depending on which option the BA wishes to view.

![Snag\_2c391e9a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdaf0e046829662ac0cebe/download/Snag_2c391e9a.png)

IF BA chooses to view the $500,000 option, the General UI will update:

![Snag\_2c3b8394.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdafab590c0b3e12c9dfba/download/Snag_2c3b8394.png)

Each option creates a version of the Insurance Quote which is sent to Member. If only one LOI option selected, only one Quote will generate, if three LOI options are selected, there Schedules will generate.

![Snag\_2c3c9a25.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdaff2c20d6317b839f1a3/download/Snag_2c3c9a25.png)

**Quote Schedule & Insurance Schedule**

Populates same place in each Schedule:

![Snag\_2c4565bb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdb233aa03e6fd295bb6ff/download/Snag_2c4565bb.png)

‌

![Snag\_2c4565bb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdb233aa03e6fd295bb6ff/download/Snag_2c4565bb.png)

data.text: HI @jessicaajami1 I’m just waiting for confirmation from the client re how LOI vs Excess works as the rules are slightly different, so double check required. Hold the line…

@jessicaajami1 Regarding how **Excess Options** work - from your query at 8.15pm on 13Aug.

- The BA can change the Excess [deselect Member selection and choose another] and save it in GeneralUI>PremiumUI. The BA selection will recalculate the premium due.
- ‌
- After making the change, if the BA pushes the proposal from Submit back to In-Progress, the BA selected Excess will remain selected in the **Limits of Insurance UI.** The example below is where I (as BA) selected $1k excess and deselected the Member’s $2k excess selection. As you can see after pushing back my BA selected $1k is still selected.

![Snag\_172bce8a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64dac718062c793505ee67f0/download/Snag_172bce8a.png)

- However, when I [as the Member] submitted the Proposal again:
  - **the PDF** is still showing the original Member selected $2k excess
  - **but the PremiumUI** is showing and calculating the $1k BA selected Excess.

![image.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64dac7e0bbc0c8e248d979ac/download/image.png)

PASSED:

- MTA

- NEW
- Run-off not required

## Where this change takes place

**Public Web>Proposal Application>Optional Extensions>Joint Venture>Add Joint Venture form**

## Current behaviour

- the first field to be entered “Name of Joint Venture or Partnership” is a required question. If the user enters a space in the input box the system reads this as an acceptance of the validation.

## Expected behaviour

- the user must fill this field in with words in order for it to pass validation.

card.desc:
## Background

When Renewal starts, both the Main & Secondary contact will receive the same invitation to start the renewal proposal. We need to let them know that two editors at a time is not a good idea.

Client has agreed we need to provide an estimate for automating a check if an additional editor (Main or Secondary contact) is in-progress, and creating a pop up to advise:

But in the meantime we are going to implement a lo-fi approach as follows.

‌

### Change

CHANGE IS REQUIRED AFTER MAIN OR SECONDARY CONTACT SELECTS ‘CLICK HERE’ FROM THE RENEWAL INVITATION LETTER THEY RECEIVE FROM US, WHICH OPENS TO THE LOG-IN UI:

![Snag\_129219fc.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c87d051717ceb31c44f927/attachments/64d999996b1b2a4ef01e034e/download/Snag_129219fc.png)

‌

card.name: 35 Main&Secondary Contacts: warning about editing Proposal at same time.

old.desc:
## Background

When Renewal starts, both the Main & Secondary contact will receive the same invitation to start the renewal proposal. We need to let them know that two editors at a time is not a good idea.

Client has agreed we need to provide an estimate for automating a check if an additional editor (Main or Secondary contact) is in-progress, and creating a pop up to advise:

But in the meantime we are going to implement a lo-fi approach as follows.

‌

### Change

CHANGE IS REQUIRED AFTER MAIN OR SECONDARY CONTACT SELECTS ‘CLICK HERE’ FROM THE RENEWAL INVITATION LETTER THEY RECEIVE FROM US, WHICH OPENS TO THE LOG-IN UI:

card.desc:
## Document affected

**Insurance Invoice** - which is generated when a member accepts a quote and becomes **Bound**. This could be any kind of applicant (new, renewal, MTA, runoff).

A full example of the Tax Invoice is attached to this ticket.

## Change

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-22\_at\_7.59.57\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb878d04f18428c1792931/attachments/64bb8c97ed5d4c54e9e88362/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-22_at_7.59.57_PM.png)

### Current behaviour

The **Due Date** is automatically generated to show on the invoice to be 14 days after date of invoice.

### New behaviour

Change **Due Date** to automatically update to the 20th of the following month of invoice.

data.text: @jessicaajami1 HI Jessica, your work flow makes sense and understand time required is hard to estimate but appreciate it as it’s complex. No doubt about it. Much appreciated xx

My current super rough estimate is maybe 15h? But I’m not sure I know what I don’t know so might be completely off and over or underestimating the effort here. data.text: @ameliacostello3 I believe that the Excess Options gets overridden once the BA updates it. So if for any reason the application goes back a step. The users loose their selection. And that’s not what we want for LOI options but just to note if this is an acceptable for excess. This might not be a realistic scenario as admin will put down notes etc but thought to check anyways. Asking about Excess options as they seems to be similar and thought I’d follow the code there.

(Just for me to think through as I pick this up again tomorrow)
Thinking of rolling this out to UAT in 3 phases:
\- Get the end to end to work with preset LOI
\- Add `Other LOI`
\- Add tooltip
This is just to make the review and testing easier and as early as possible.

Will just testing the draft saw some error come in on proposal generation PDF which I believe are pre-existing but that might impact estimation.

General technical split that I’ll work through:

- Add a db table to save the choice for the BA
- Field to default the choices from user requesting and not overwrite users chances. Make sure if for any reason workflow goes back to user this is reset.
- Update workflow to use the LOI options for quotation => General UI Update. Test different states for proposal view vs edit mode on LOI options
- Quote document selection => only show the BA overwritten values
- Do some end to end testing
- Haven’t looked into unit testing but should be something to poke at

card.desc:
NEW: functionality to allow BA to manually change LOI in a submitted proposal.

NOTE: This new function will act in the same way as adding/deleting Optional Extensions. What the Practice has selected locks into the PDF Proposal. **Any changes by BA do not update the Proposal but does populate Quote, Insurance Schedule and Invoice.**

## Background:

When Member submits a proposal VPIS may decide not to cover them for the LOI (Limits of Insurance) they've selected, and/or include a different one.

**This new function will allow the Admin to manage the LOI and make the change, without needing to push the Proposal back to In-Progress for the Practice to re-submit.**

The Member selects the Limit of Indemnity from the **Proposal Form UI>Limits of Insurance Cover:**

![Snag\_2e2b272.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d595a635a4ca69f7f4179c/download/Snag_2e2b272.png)

Their selections they’ve made show in **General UI>Premiums**. In this example the Member has requested quotes for 2 LOI’s [$1m & $2m] AND 2 Excess’s [$2k & $5k].

![Snag\_2e8c57f.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d59733533a06ed173ac7f3/download/Snag_2e8c57f.png)

The premium calculation sheet [highlighted in yellow] is displaying the values for the $2m LOI and $5k Excess.

![Snag\_2f13ac8.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d5995e439bef01f64c2f98/download/Snag_2f13ac8.png)

If the BA wanted to view the calculation for the $2m LOI and $2k Excess, they’d select the $2k excess and the values sheet would show the calculations for that selection

![Snag\_2f77497.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64d59af988ccbcc39c7bf5d1/download/Snag_2f77497.png)

## Where the change will take place

**Admin Portal>[select submitted proposal]>Premiums tab.**

See:

[https://www.loom.com/share/aa85477640fb4d65a0df079085cdb9dc](https://www.loom.com/share/aa85477640fb4d65a0df079085cdb9dc "smartCard-embed")

## Changes

See summary below:

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-31\_at\_11.09.20\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64c6eda5a1f908467d709459/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-31_at_11.09.20_AM.png)

### 1. **Allow BA to add LOI options which will generate additional Quote.**

In the same style as the two other option boxes, add a new option box below with the heading: “LOI Options, any one claim”.

Multiple select checkbox options:

- $500,000
- $750,000
- $1,000,000
- $2,000,000
- $3,000,000
- $4,000,000
- $5,000,000

Add a write in box for a custom amount “Other LOI”

NOTE: BA can apply LOI options to any of the Indemnity amounts - see below.

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-31\_at\_11.16.35\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64c6ef59a4a593383fbcef57/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-31_at_11.16.35_AM.png)

#### Behaviour

- If BA **deselects** options, new Quotes will not generate
  If BA **selects** new options new Quotes - one for each LOI option selected - will generate.

### 2. Add help tips

Beside the existing Excess Options and new LOI Options boxes, add help tips that read: “Manage which Options are quoted here.”

### 3. Where/when does it show

When BA sends Quote to Member the LOI Option displays in each of these pages depending on which option the BA wishes to view.

![Snag\_2c391e9a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdaf0e046829662ac0cebe/download/Snag_2c391e9a.png)

IF BA chooses to view the $500,000 option, the General UI will update:

![Snag\_2c3b8394.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdafab590c0b3e12c9dfba/download/Snag_2c3b8394.png)

Each option creates a version of the Insurance Quote which is sent to Member. If only one LOI option selected, only one Quote will generate, if three LOI options are selected, there Schedules will generate.

![Snag\_2c3c9a25.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdaff2c20d6317b839f1a3/download/Snag_2c3c9a25.png)

**Quote Schedule & Insurance Schedule**

Populates same place in each Schedule:

![Snag\_2c4565bb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdb233aa03e6fd295bb6ff/download/Snag_2c4565bb.png)

‌

![Snag\_2c4565bb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3d6878a68fc538d73a50/attachments/64cdb233aa03e6fd295bb6ff/download/Snag_2c4565bb.png)

data.text: @heeni_tito Re your query re Annual premium vs Run-off finalised premium. It is correct. 6 years is the longest they can Run-off for - and they get charged the full Run-off amount in the first year they take it out. So the total premium at time Run-off started was $925.75, which was pro-rated to the number of days left in the year they required cover, bringing the total back to $805. So perfectly done - thank you :-)

@heeni_tito this change only applies to **Run-off** Practices. Should not apply to New Applicants, Renew or MTA practices who are not in Run-off.

So not sure where the data is coming from for the views below. Run-off data should not appear on the General UI’s for these Proposal types.

![Snag\_2229b36.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d057ae50018415513414e2/attachments/64d56479a4931aa6313ad714/download/Snag_2229b36.png)

Yes that makes sense. 👍🏻

HI @jessicaajami1 Just spoke to BA who confirmed that if the BA makes a change to the LOI options, and then pushes the Proposal back to the Member (from Submitted to In-Progress), the Proposal returns to the Member selected state [e.g any change made to the LOI by the BA are not saved]. The Member receives the proposal back with the selections the Member made before submitting].

‌

When the Member resubmits, the proposal UI and PDF reflects whatever selections the Member has made from In-Progress.

Hope that makes sense :-)

card.name: 1. Edit Claims Declaration popup to Accept button on Manage My Insurance quote view.
17 Proposal form: validation for integers only
17 Proposal form: validation for integers only

card.desc:
## Issue

When a NEW or RENEWAL applicant is filling in the proposal form, there are **two instances** where the system only accepts whole numbers (integers) but users are still able to enter non-integers. This blocks progress to the next section.

## Case one: Main Practice

Validation for staff employed on **Proposal Application>Main Business Details > Main Practice profile > Add** _or_ **Edit Main Practice or Applicant Details** form.

BELOW: location of form

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-24\_at\_1.48.15\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64a338fdbcbe31b1bf33e9ac/attachments/64bdf46451d1f4dc3aa3c6bb/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-24_at_1.48.15_PM.png)

Check out where exactly the questions to change is in the form [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pT-d5IHhEroMYA9WHKPDCILA4zmfbpNQ/view?usp=drive_link "‌").

## **Current behaviour**

For the question: “How many staff does your Practice employ, excluding Veterinarians/Technicians?” the system allows non-integers to be entered and move through the rest of the questions, but then stops user from moving past the SAVE button - at which point an error appears on the section but isn’t very clear wording (see BELOW).

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-04\_at\_9.12.19\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64a338fdbcbe31b1bf33e9ac/attachments/64a339b8eb93453ab5360e27/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-04_at_9.12.19_AM.png)

## Expected behaviour :white_check_mark:

Users should not be able to enter non-integers into these input fields. If they try to do so, a clear explanation as to why this has blocked their progress should be visible.

## Case two: Validation for **Financial Details**:

![FireShot\_Capture\_015\_-\_Financial\_Details\_-\_VPIS\_-\_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64a338fdbcbe31b1bf33e9ac/attachments/64bdf30d741cfc993ea141bf/download/FireShot_Capture_015_-_Financial_Details_-_VPIS_-_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png)

**Problem**: If a User enters a non-integer they can’t move past page there is an error message appear why the input to “Breakdown of Professional Fees” has not validated, but no error message as to why the other two questions have not.

## Expected behaviour:white_check_mark:

Users should not be able to enter non-integers into these input fields. If they try to do so, a clear explanation as to why this has blocked their progress should be visible.

**Problem**: If a User enters a non-integer they can’t move past page there is an error message appear why the input to “Breakdown of Professional Fees” has not validated, but no error message as to why the other two questions have not.

## Expected behaviour

Users should not be able to enter non-integers into these input fields. If they try to do so, a clear explanation as to why this has blocked their progress should be visible.

## Where change takes place

**Public Web>Proposal Application>Optional Extensions>Joint Venture>Add Joint Venture form**

and Proposal PDF> Optional Expenses>Joint Venture Liability

NOTE: form will only be visible in the UI if the question “Do you/the Practice want to be insured for a Joint Venture with another party?” is YES

See below:

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_2.49.56\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d05b05c6f8728bff0cf127/attachments/64d05c0fe9c80f65465cc075/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_2.49.56_PM.png)

## Changes

### 40.1

In the **Add Joint Venture form** edit the following questions:

1. “Name the other parties in the venture”
   to be:
   “Name the other parties in the Joint Venture or Partnership”
2. “Provide a brief description of the venture’s business activities”
   to be:
   ”Provide a brief description of the Joint Venture’s or Partnership’s business activities”
3. “What date was the venture established?”
   to be:
   ”What date was the Joint Venture or Partnership established?
4. “Detail any contractual obligations in the venture related to insurance”
   to be:
   ”Detail any contractual obligations in the Joint Venture or Partnership related to insurance”
5. “Detail any other insurance cover taken out by the venture”
   to be:
   ”Detail any other insurance cover taken out by the Joint Venture or Partnership”
6. “Has the Joint Venture experienced any insurance claims or losses since inception?”
   to be:
   ”Has the Joint Venture or Partnership experienced any insurance claims or losses since inception?”
   ‌

### 40.2

Reflect all changes in 40.1 in the Joint Venture Liability section of the Proposal PDF (see below)

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_2.58.34\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d05b05c6f8728bff0cf127/attachments/64d05e44defe446599bec73d/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_2.58.34_PM.png)

‌

**NOTE: No change required:**

‘Name of Joint Venture or Partnership’ also displays in:

- Insurance Quote
- Insurance Schedule

![Snag\_36fe41d0.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d05b05c6f8728bff0cf127/attachments/64d070e3225e581b6ba6a43c/download/Snag_36fe41d0.png)

card.desc:
## Where the changes will take place:

**Insurance Quote** & **Insurance Schedule**\> **POLICY SECTION> Optional Extensions Included> Section 2.9 Conveyor Activity**

NOTE: the member must select cover for Conveyor Activity for this field to be added to the documents. A copy of both documents with this field is attached to this ticket.

**How Quote is generated:**

→ Once a member has submitted a proposal and the BA has accepted the application an **Insurance Quote** is generated and emailed to the member.

**How Schedule is generated:**

→ Once the new member has accepted the Insurance Quote, a range of documents including the **Insurance Schedule** are generated.

## Changes

### 29.1

On both documents, add a full single line under current **Section 2.9 Conveyor Activity** table field to read:

“For full details of individuals covered by this extension, please refer to Professionals to be Insured.”

‌

BELOW: See example of the change

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_12.27.02\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d034578a0849bc4a5413ee/attachments/64d03a595cf3cc14e3a32619/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_12.27.02_PM.png)

### 29.2

Enter the same change in 29.1 under current **Section 2.8 Production Animal Technician/s**

BELOW: See example of the change

card.desc:
## Change background

After logging-in for the first time, when the users starts a Proposal template (see below), they are required to read, and have available to down load, a copy of **Important Notices**.

Before they can proceed to complete the _Proposal Form_ they have to tick a box confirming they have read and understood the **Important Notices**.

This UI has edits to be made (screenshot of UI below):

![Snag\_36140da3.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d034efd1a07f4a7748bbc4/download/Snag_36140da3.png)

### Who

- New Applicant starting proposal for first time
- Renewing member starting a proposal
- Member creating an MTA
- Member starting a Run-off

### Description

1. **Important Notices>Insurer:** Replace paragraph with the following:

_From 1 October 2022, VPIS ceased to be a Small Insurer for the purposes of the Insurance (Prudential Supervision) Regulations 2010. This change meant that VPIS’ solvency capital position was required to be above $3m.   For the period 1 October 2022 to 30 September 2023, the Reserve Bank allowed VPIS forbearance from enforcement of this requirement.  As from 1 October 2023, VPIS expects to be fully compliant with the solvency capital requirements._

![Snag\_36152feb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d035389615ce6787e2c14f/download/Snag_36152feb.png)

2\. Link privacy statement to -  [privacy statement](https://vpis.org.nz/privacy "‌")

‌

![Snag\_361db7a2.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d03767ae00d024a08a3c6e/download/Snag_361db7a2.png)

3\. Edit to read: _Privacy Act 2020,_ …

‌

_From 1 October 2022, VPIS ceased to be a Small Insurer for the purposes of the Insurance (Prudential Supervision) Regulations 2010. - New

![Snag\_26b72be3.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab38af34015d4e6c4f0f03/attachments/64cc461bc5a1cbf32e60f51e/download/Snag_26b72be3.png)

## Changes

Flow through to pdf template.

1\. Update ‘Declaration’ heading to read: “Conditions”

![Snag\_36c279fb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab38af34015d4e6c4f0f03/attachments/64d06195b00c6ba8af219820/download/Snag_36c279fb.png)

‌

2\. Delete YES/NO buttons. No longer required (see above)

3\. Replace 2 x sections of bullets with new copy shown below:

‌

![Snag\_26bbafa6.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab38af34015d4e6c4f0f03/attachments/64cc4743745af8991a5324eb/download/Snag_26bbafa6.png)

# NEW COPY

**Expectations of insured:**

- Work performed by Practice Production Animal Technician/s is in accordance with the “NZVA Large Animal Veterinary Technicians: Professional Guidelines.” **[Link to guidelines PDF attached - see NOTE BELOW]**
- Practice Production Animal Technician/s are assessed annually for competence by their Supervising Veterinarian(s) prior to performing the tasks assigned to them.
- Training records are maintained for each Practice Production Animal Technician that provide evidence of competence and training undertaken in relation to tasks assigned to them.
- The training records for each Practice Production Animal Technician are updated annually, and are signed and dated by the Practice Production Animal Technician/s Supervising Veterinarian(s).

**In the event of a claim:**

- VPIS will require evidence of your Practice Production Animal Technician/s annual training records for the tasks undertaken, including each task relating to the claim.
- The standard excess under this extension is $2,000 +GST or your chosen professional indemnity excess, whichever is higher.
- If the above "Expectations of insured" are not met, an additional excess of up to $15,000 +GST may apply.
- The VPIS Policy Wording contains the full terms and conditions of cover under this extension. In the event of any difference between statements made by VPIS in this document and the Policy, the Policy will prevail.

‌

[End copy here]

## NOTE:

The **NZVA Large Animal Veterinary Technicians: Professional Guidelines** link opens to attached PDF. There is no change to PDF this links to. I have just provided here for completeness and safety in case the existing one in the system gets deleted.

[LAVT\_Professional\_Guidelines(1).pdf](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab38af34015d4e6c4f0f03/attachments/64cb19b53b4cf49bae76b61a/download/LAVT_Professional_Guidelines(1).pdf "‌")

## Where this change takes place

**Public Web>Proposal Application>Declaration & Submit>Submit**

For all proposal types.

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_1.40.06\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d04b64cdf3e7644dd2b0cb/attachments/64d04b79dce742eb5b42e62e/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_1.40.06_PM.png)

ABOVE: where change takes place

## Changes

### 33.1

Add a popup that appears after user clicks on SUBMIT that reads:

“Are you sure you wish to submit this proposal?”

with options **Submit** and **Cancel**

See example below

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_1.44.23\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d04b64cdf3e7644dd2b0cb/attachments/64d04c7a827cb65b3bd85c51/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_1.44.23_PM.png)

NOTE: submit button should be green as shown above.

### Behaviour

On **Submit**: close the popup>proposal submits>current success alert appears.

On **Cancel**: close the popup.

## Where the changes will take place:

**Insurance Quote** & **Insurance Schedule**\> **POLICY SECTION> Optional Extensions Included> Section 2.9 Conveyor Activity**

NOTE: the member must select cover for Conveyor Activity for this field to be added to the documents. A copy of both documents with this field is attached to this ticket.

**How Invoice is generated:**

→ Once a member has submitted a proposal and the BA has accepted the application an **Insurance Invoice** is generated and emailed to the member.

**How Schedule is generated:**

→ Once the new member has accepted the Insurance Invoice, a range of documents including the **Insurance Schedule** are generated.

## Changes

### 29.1

On both documents, add a full single line under current **Section 2.9 Conveyor Activity** table field to read:

“For full details of individuals covered by this extension, please refer to Professionals to be Insured.”

‌

BELOW: See example of the change

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_12.27.02\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d034578a0849bc4a5413ee/attachments/64d03a595cf3cc14e3a32619/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_12.27.02_PM.png)

card.desc:
## Description

NEW: functionality to allow Members to export a CSV file of Professionals to be Insured from their **Manage my Insurance** folder for:

- Veterinarians
- Locum Veterinarians
- Production Animal Technician/s
- Non-Veterinary Professionals
- Non-Veterinary Practice Principal/Directors

‌

![Snag\_36223d2a.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d02612c562f942964af2ba/attachments/64d0389046106f3f03d467e9/download/Snag_36223d2a.png)

‌

The information to be exported is a sub-set of the Member Breakdown CSV Report **relating to their Practice only**:

![Snag\_35e22804.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d02612c562f942964af2ba/attachments/64d028286f161ed43e6edcec/download/Snag_35e22804.png)

card.desc:
## Change background

After logging-in for the first time, when the users listed below start a Proposal template, they are required to read, and have available to down load, a copy of **Important Notices**.

Before they can proceed to complete the _Proposal Form_ they have to tick a box confirming they have read and understood the **Important Notices**.

This UI has edits to be made (screenshot of UI below):

![Snag\_36140da3.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d034efd1a07f4a7748bbc4/download/Snag_36140da3.png)

### Who

- New Applicant starting proposal for first time
- Renewing member starting a proposal
- Member creating an MTA
- Member completing Run-off

### Description

1. **Important Notices>Insurer:** Replace paragraph with the following:

_From 1 October 2022, VPIS ceased to be a Small Insurer for the purposes of the Insurance (Prudential Supervision) Regulations 2010. This change meant that VPIS’ solvency capital position was required to be above $3m.   For the period 1 October 2022 to 30 September 2023, the Reserve Bank allowed VPIS forbearance from enforcement of this requirement.  As from 1 October 2023, VPIS expects to be fully compliant with the solvency capital requirements._

![Snag\_36152feb.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d035389615ce6787e2c14f/download/Snag_36152feb.png)

2\. Link privacy statement to -  [privacy statement](https://vpis.org.nz/privacy "‌")

‌

![Snag\_361db7a2.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d03767ae00d024a08a3c6e/download/Snag_361db7a2.png)

3\. Edit to read: _Privacy Act 2020,_ …

‌

![Snag\_361f9f10.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d037e43ec4039d56d630e5/download/Snag_361f9f10.png)

4\. Replace the PDF [Important Notices - Sept 23.pdf](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64c85a854e13ae8b19813e59/download/Important_Notices_-_Sept_23.pdf "‌")

‌

![Snag\_36207e06.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c85a1bafab5a2d265b784c/attachments/64d0381d79aa72ee121e3343/download/Snag_36207e06.png)

## Description

NEW: functionality to allow Members to export a CSV file of Professionals to be Insured from their **Manage my Insurance** folder for:

- Veterinarians
- Locum Veterinarians

**Public Web>Proposal Application>Main Practices & Branches> Add/Edit/Review Main Practice Branch Form**

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-04\_at\_10.17.50\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d0192f136093022f30e328/attachments/64d0196517c261da8fd6a81b/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-04_at_10.17.50_AM.png)

## Changes

### 26.1

When YES is selected at question **Do you have contracts with any of the following or other organisations: MPI, AsureQuality, local Zoos?** && the when YES is selected for the following question (which appears after the first is selected) **Are you required to hold Professional Liability Insurance under these contracts?**

- Edit the current wording “Please provide a copy of the relevant section” to “Please submit a copy of your contract, or the section outlining your insurance requirements.”

See BELOW

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_10.14.23\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d0192f136093022f30e328/attachments/64d01b42b4c1b616ab15818e/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_10.14.23_AM.png)

### 26.2

When YES is selected for the question **“Does the Practice operate out of a commercial premise?”** and the Commercial Premise fields appear, edit the content:

“Is the postal address different from the physical address? We do require an address to deliver mail to, so select Yes if you haven't included a physical address for your business.”

to be:

“Is the postal address different from the physical address?”

[DELETE~~We do require an address to deliver mail to, so select Yes if you haven't included a physical address for your business.~~]

### 26.3

In the **Authorisation** section at the bottom of the form, replace the content:

“Do you/the Practice authorise VPIS to use the provided contact details to send relevant communications including including information and advice about managing your risk that relate to one or more of your/the Practice's specialist areas or invitations to special events?”

to be:

“Can VPIS use the contact details you have provided to communicate information or advice relating to your insurance?”

### 26.4

Update the Proposal PDF section **5. Claims, Additional Information and Declaration** (BELOW in red) with the change from 26.3.

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-08-07\_at\_10.58.17\_AM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64d0192f136093022f30e328/attachments/64d0258ccc30c3b962a1b0cd/download/Screen_Shot_2023-08-07_at_10.58.17_AM.png)

### 26.5

cards.desc:
Investigation:

- Can it be done?
- How long would it take?
- Can it be implemented during the renewal process? (It would expedite decision making during renewal.)

Our VPIS platform has not been designed for responsiveness on different devices - primarily it’s super bad on mobile phones.

Over time we should improve this so across the board everything is fully responsive, but there are key views which should be prioritised.

These views would make a significant difference for the committee member users to contribute to the renewal process:

- Discussion board
- Voting tool (also part of invited access in Discussion view)

Not all the content has to be re-laid on the mobile view - in the progress bar the only ones that are relevant to Discussions are: **Submitted; Discussions; and Review**.

## Problem

Invoice paid date is dependent upon manual input.

This information is supposed to be updated by VPIS Admin who is supposed to receive the information from VPIS Finance but this information is not provided regularly to be of use

![Snag\_309098b0.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ceca32bc0229301ec25311/attachments/64cecb98545110bf75d09b6a/download/Snag_309098b0.png)

e.g. the Broker Admin wants easy access to this information as they are frequently called to advise Members if they’ve paid or not. We created this Payment Summary view to enable fulfilment of these queries but has proven fruitless given the information isn’t input.

‌

![Snag\_30933e1e.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ceca32bc0229301ec25311/attachments/64cecc465d378af283685ed1/download/Snag_30933e1e.png)

## Question

Am I correct that we can’t upload information from Xero to our system?

## Solution is still manual?

If we are not able to upload from Xero, the only solution is to train VPIS Finance to input the paid date in our system when they are updating Xero.
cards.name: Automate 'Invoice Paid' process to update System UI - INVESTIGATION

cards.desc:
**Advised that this a fairly complicated explanation that might be better to have a quick run through with Amelia or Meghan.**

_These changes are relatively simple but they do trigger dynamically rendered questions in another area of the form if certain conditions are met._

_They also connect with content in the relative generated pdfs that needs to be updated._

**This ticket also relates to 5.2.2**

## Who does it impact: All proposals

- New Applicants
- Renewing Members
- MTA & Run-Off

## Core change requirement

- Delete questions from the Proposal Form
- Update the relevant PDFs

## Where the changes are to be made

Questions will be deleted from the section: [**Public Portal**](https://public.uat.ezidocs.nz "‌") **\> Proposal Application > Main Practices & Branches > Add Main Practice** _also_ **Edit Main Practice > Your Business Details**

Sign in details are [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J0GwOZUA2HdhtRXmBuD7iCchCZnvIFWOaZgWaIwZxDE/edit#heading=h.4tc1i3ueyd7v "‌").

‌

BELOW: Questions are triggered from this button when the form is being filled in for the first time:

![Snag\_a9483d2.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9f047e176251c49da8fd1/download/Snag_a9483d2.png)

BELOW:

Questions are triggered from either of these buttons when the Main Practice has already been added.

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-21\_at\_2.44.07\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9f13af6405492b46393a5/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-21_at_2.44.07_PM.png)

## Changes

NOTE: while these following questions are to be deleted from this section in the **Proposal Form UI**, they are going to be moved into other sections. The inputted answers to these questions currently render in the Proposal PDF should remain the same after the changes to the order in the UI.

Delete three questions from **Your Business Details UI**:

1. Are you going to apply for Non-Veterinary Activity Consultancy extension cover?
2. Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?
3. Are you going to apply for Conveyor Activities extension cover for individual Technicians?
   ‌

![FireShot\_Capture\_007\_-\_Main\_Business\_Details\_-\_VPIS\_-\_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9f9d3f6bf1d76f6a85e9c/download/FireShot_Capture_007_-_Main_Business_Details_-_VPIS_-_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png)

NOTE: “Are you going to apply for Conveyor Activities extension cover for individual Technicians?” only renders in the UI when “Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?” is selected.

## Checking the follow-on affects

### Professional Staff>Add Staff>Technicians

Currently if “Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?” is selected the question: “Does the Practice require Technician Extension cover for claims arising from work undertaken by this Technician?” is added to [**Professional Staff> Add Professional Staff > Technician**](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mrlm71Fqqs0dHdkRDYTPEuIcESwkQjMM/view?usp=drive_link "‌"). (SEE image below)

‌

![FireShot\_Capture\_008\_-\_Professional\_Staff\_Applicant\_Details\_-\_VPIS\_-\_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64b9fe657b98244884318b0d/download/FireShot_Capture_008_-_Professional_Staff_Applicant_Details_-_VPIS_-_public.uat.ezidocs.nz.png)

Previously, when “Yes” was selected for this question, a follow on question would appear in the UI: “Does the Practice require cover for conveyor activities for work undertaken by this Technician?”.

After the origin question is removed, this follow on question should also be deleted.

‌

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-22\_at\_3.25.40\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64bb4f866bebe2b5ad82ae72/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-22_at_3.25.40_PM.png)

### Proposal PDF

ASSIST: for docs on how to test PDFs see [here](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1J0GwOZUA2HdhtRXmBuD7iCchCZnvIFWOaZgWaIwZxDE/edit#heading=h.bj5mgryz5f5a "‌"). For this ticket a good example to use would be **Clutha Veterinary Association Incorporated**.

Currently if “Are you going to apply for Technician Coverage extension cover?” is selected, the following question is added to the **Proposal PDF>Appendix: People to be insured:**

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-21\_at\_3.52.40\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64ba014492c449ac19b46367/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-21_at_3.52.40_PM.png)

CHECK: once the origin question is deleted, this sentence should show BUT ….should also be deleted from the PDF.

Currently, if “Are you going to apply for Conveyor Activities extension cover for individual Technicians?” is selected, the following question is added to the **Proposal PDF>Optional Extensions > Technician Coverage section:**

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-22\_at\_1.21.49\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab37e35b39714910e2f17b/attachments/64bb2f72e32cfb23d1438c98/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-22_at_1.21.49_PM.png)

cards.desc:
This ticket relates to 5.2.1. It should be done after 5.2.1.

## Context

_One of the changes in 5.2.1 is removing the question “Does the Practice require Technician Extension cover for claims arising from work undertaken by this Technician?” from **Professional Staff> Add Professional Staff > Technician**._

_Previously, when “Yes” was selected for this question, a follow on question would appear in the UI: “Does the Practice require cover for conveyor activities for work undertaken by this Technician?”._

_After the origin question is removed, this follow on question should also be deleted._

## Changes

![Screen\_Shot\_2023-07-22\_at\_4.09.27\_PM.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64bb4b626b2943a5b80b98ce/attachments/64bb57914f6bc149001aed62/download/Screen_Shot_2023-07-22_at_4.09.27_PM.png)

ABOVE: example of changes.

### 5.2.2

Below the **required** question “Supervising Veterinarian’s main area of expertise? Add the question: “Will this Technician be undertaking conveyor activities for the Practice? If YES, Conveyor Activities will be added to your cover.”

Answer is a Yes | No toggle.

#### Behaviour: _**the behaviour of adding Yes to this question is the same as the previous question “Does the Practice require cover for conveyor activities for work undertaken by this Technician?” which was deleted in 5.2.1.**_

If YES:

1. **Conveyor Activity Extension** automatically selects in the **Proposal PDF**
2. Name of Technician is added to **Conveyor Activity** in **Proposal PDF**
3. Render **required** question: “Who is responsible for providing training to the Technician to use the conveyor?” with input text box. The text entered here is added to **Proposal PDF>Appendix: People to be insured.**

### 5.2.3

Add Policy information and link to: ??

### 5.2.4

Add help tip: “Refer to clause 2.9 for more information.”

cards.desc:
## Background

When Renewal starts, both the Main & Secondary contact will receive the same invitation to start the renewal proposal. We need to let them know that two editors at a time is not a good idea.

Client has agreed we need to provide an estimate for automating a check if an additional editor (Main or Secondary contact) is in-progress, and creating a pop up to advise:

But in the meantime we are going to implement a lo-fi approach as follows.

‌

### Change

CHANGE IS REQUIRED AFTER MAIN OR SECONDARY CONTACT SELECTS ‘CLICK HERE’ FROM THE RENEWAL INVITATION LETTER THEY RECEIVE FROM US, WHICH OPENS TO THE LOG-IN UI:

![Snag\_129219fc.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c87d051717ceb31c44f927/attachments/64d999996b1b2a4ef01e034e/download/Snag_129219fc.png)

‌

35\.1 Create a pop-up that shows when the Main or Secondary contact selects log-in to start the Renewal:

![Snag\_129773ec.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c87d051717ceb31c44f927/attachments/64d99af751a31aad15d40717/download/Snag_129773ec.png)

35\.2 Pop-up to read:

_**Reminder: Only one editor at a time**_

- _Only one editor should update the proposal at a time or changes may be overwritten and lost_
- _If there’s a chance someone else is currently updating this proposal, please check with them before proceeding._

‌

![Snag\_129b37d9.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c87d051717ceb31c44f927/attachments/64d99beed559aceb8be946a8/download/Snag_129b37d9.png)

35\.3 When they select ‘Close’ the pop-up will close and if they select the log-in button again, the proposal will open.

![Snag\_129773ec.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64c87d051717ceb31c44f927/attachments/64d99af751a31aad15d40717/download/Snag_129773ec.png)

NOTE: the member must select cover for Conveyor Activity for this field to be added to the documents. A copy of both documents with this field is attached to this ticket.

**PROBLEM:** Broker Admin forgetting to include a premium when Quoting

## CHANGES

To affect:

- **Public Web Portal>Proposal Form>Optional Extensions>Technician Coverage**
- **Admin Portal>Proposals>{submitted member proposal}>Premiums table**

### 6.1

**Dependent on Ticket 5.3:** If Yes is selected for question “If you require a higher limit ….” three checkboxes with multiple select options show

- $100,000
- $200,000
- Other

NOTE: If “Other” is selected, an existing write-in field appears below checkboxes.

### 6.2

When the applicant selects $100k and/or $200k the **BH Additional Technician Premium ($50k+)** field in **Admin Portal>>>Premiums** table is populated with the calculated amount.

![image.png](https://trello.com/1/cards/64ab3c9650d03e8a0be90d32/attachments/64b71603921e168f9ef238a5/download/image.png)
